name: handsontable
description: Handsontable is a JavaScript Spreadsheet Component available for React, Angular and Vue.
author: Handsoncode <hello@handsontable.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:types && npm run test:walkontable && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:e2e-ce && npm run test:production
scripts.test:walkontable: npm run build:walkontable && npm run test:walkontable.dump && npm run test:walkontable.puppeteer
scripts.test:production: npm run build:umd.min && npm run build:languages.min && npm run test:production.dump && npm run test:e2e.puppeteer
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:umd && npm run build:languages && npm run test:e2e.dump && npm run test:e2e.puppeteer
scripts.test:e2e.watch: node ./.config/bin/trigger-on-stdout-change.js "concurrently --raw --kill-others 'npm run build:umd -- --watch' 'npm run test:e2e.dump -- --watch'" "npm run test:e2e.puppeteer"
scripts.test:e2e-ce: npm run build-ce:umd && npm run build:languages-ce && npm run test:e2e-ce.dump && npm run test:e2e.puppeteer
scripts.test:e2e-ce.watch: node ./.config/bin/trigger-on-stdout-change.js "concurrently --raw --kill-others 'npm run build-ce:umd -- --watch' 'npm run test:e2e-ce.dump -- --watch'" "npm run test:e2e.puppeteer"
scripts.test:production.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-production env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js e2e=./test/e2e/index.js
scripts.test:e2e.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-e2e env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js e2e=./test/e2e/index.js
scripts.test:e2e-ce.dump: cross-env HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=ce_commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-ce-e2e env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js e2e=./test/e2e/index.js
scripts.test:mobile.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-mobile env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js mobile=./test/e2e/mobile/index.js
scripts.watch: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=watch env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules --watch src/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd.min && npm run build:languages && npm run build:languages.min
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_dist env-cmd ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir commonjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es env-cmd ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build-ce: npm run build-ce:commonjs && npm run build-ce:es && npm run build-ce:umd && npm run build-ce:umd.min && npm run build:languages-ce && npm run build:languages-ce.min
scripts.build-ce:commonjs: cross-env HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=ce_commonjs_dist env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir commonjs
scripts.build-ce:es: cross-env HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=ce_es env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build-ce:umd: cross-env HOT_FILENAME=handsontable HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=ce_commonjs NODE_ENV=development env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules ./src/index.js
scripts.build-ce:umd.min: cross-env HOT_FILENAME=handsontable HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=ce_commonjs NODE_ENV=production env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules ./src/index.js
scripts.build:languages-ce: cross-env HOT_FILENAME=handsontable HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=languages-development env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack
scripts.build:languages-ce.min: cross-env HOT_FILENAME=handsontable HOT_PACKAGE_TYPE=ce BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=languages-production env-cmd --no-override ./hot.config.js webpack
scripts.release: npm run release:ce && npm run release:pro
scripts.release:ce: npm run clean && npm run build-ce && npm run copy:builds-ce && npm run copy:updated-package-file-ce && npm publish ./tmp/
scripts.release:pro: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy:builds && npm run copy:updated-package-file && npm publish ./tmp/
